message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider accepting, as the money loses value over time.

I appreciate the fairness of your proposal, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split in my favor is a more equitable outcome. It accounts for the fact that the money loses value more quickly for you than for me. Let's see if you agree.
Bob, this is my final offer.  A 55/45 split in my favor is the most I'm willing to concede.  Let's end this now before inflation eats away at the pot even more.
